title: As Oil Companies Stay Lean, Workers Move to Renewable Energy
description: Solar, wind, geothermal, battery and other alternative-energy businesses are adding workers from fossil fuel companies, where employment has fallen.

title: In Latest Round of Job Cuts, Twitter Is Said to Lay Off at Least 200 Employees
description: The social media platform now has a work force of less than 2,000, down from 7,500 when Elon Musk took it over in October.
